bibl.title: P. Yadin 21-22: Sale or Lease?

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.note: Introduction. - The Egyptian καρπωνεία contracts. - ἀντὶ τῶν ἐμῶν / σῶν κόπων καὶ ἀναλωμάτων - in return for my / your labors and expenses. - These documents in light of Tannaitic literature. - Conclusions. - Appendix.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert

bibl.seg: RADZYNER Amihai, P. Yadin 21-22: Sale or Lease?
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 145-163.

Introduction. - The Egyptian καρπωνεία contracts. - ἀντὶ τῶν ἐμῶν / σῶν κόπων καὶ ἀναλωμάτων - in return for my / your labors and expenses. - These documents in light of Tannaitic literature. - Conclusions. - Appendix.
